SVG Viewer

Useful application to view SVG files and convert them to PNG format.

Multiple options for file selection

The application can open SVG documents from: file explorer applications, native file picker, Dropbox, OneDrive and Google Drive.

Renders SVG Files

The application can render very quickly SVG files. The generated file will have HD quality and won't exceed your screen size.

Simple app that can be used by everyone

Ideal for users who want to visualize SVG files stored on their smartphone device.

Best SVG Viewer available in Play Store

Modern mobile application implemented using material design and latest library upgrades available from Google

Adding SVG files

SVG files can be added from your local storage, Drobox, OneDrive and Google Drive.

Advanced settings

Multiple settings are available for viewer customization and SVG file rendering.

File Layers

Application can show/hide SVG layers and Inksape labels.

Recent files

Has the feature to show recent selected files with the possibility to convert all of them to PNG format

Full screen

Fullscreen mode is available as an option in the navigation menu

Inkscape

Application is compatible with Inkscape files.
